A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie felt more like some sort of Samurai movie or Marvel movie than a star wars movie. A good movie but it didn't feel like Star Wars at a lot of points. The acting was superb. The visuals were stunning. It wasn't Star Wars. The plots and visuals felt so far removed from what the original trilogies were. There's nothing wrong with remixing and originality but\, this movie fell flat. The last twenty or so minutes are what make this movie fall flat. It felt more like a rushed conclusion to what is supposed to be a plot spanning across three movies. I'm hopeful for a better Episode IX but I'm VERY cautious. I would still see this movie but be aware that \"this isn't going to go the way you think.\"
